import "./Welcome.scss"; import image from "./image.svg"; function Welcome(props){ return(

{props.heading}

We provide a comprehensive debt collection service

{props.paragraph}

Our professionals have a combined 85 years in debt recovery efforts that have seen the recovery of more than N19Billion in debt from very unwilling debtors.

We use the most advanced techniques to trace debtors and recover money owed. We also offer an alternative method for loan recoveries by allowing debtors provide value worth the amount they are unable to pay.

▶️ Watch the Video
) } export default Welcome;
